info.title: Azure-ContainerStorageRP
info.description: Azure Container Storage Resource Provider API.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List Pool resources by subscription ID
List Pool resources by resource group

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.
The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

csiParams.description: List of KV pairs to set in StorageClass to configure CSI driver.

maxVolumeCapacityGiB.description: Maximum capacity of the volumes in GiB the user intends to create. Default 512.

disks.description: Only required if individual disk selection is desired. Path to disk, e.g. <nodename>:/dev/sda or WWN. Supports specifying multiple disks (same syntax as tags).

nodeName.description: Name of the node disk is attached on

devicePath.description: Used to import SSD to discover WWN

resourceGroup.description: Resource group of an existing SAN.

volumeGroup.description: Volume group of an existing SAN.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group of an existing SAN.

volumeGroup.description: Volume group of an existing SAN.

values.name: EncryptionAtRestWithPlatformKey
values.description: Encryption at rest with platform key

diskSelector.description: Template name or KV pairs containing disk selection criteria, e.g. model="Microsoft NVMe Direct Disk" to match all Lsv2 NVMe disks.

disks.description: Only required if individual disk selection is desired. Path to disk, e.g. <nodename>:/dev/sda or WWN. Supports specifying multiple disks (same syntax as tags).

diskFormat.description: Consent to format the local disks.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The Pool items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PoolListResult.description: The response of a Pool list operation.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

poolType.description: Type of the Pool: ephemeral, disk, managed, or elasticsan.

zones.description: List of availability zones that resources can be created in.

poolCapacityGiB.description: Initial capacity of the pool in GiB.

assignments.description: List of resources that should have access to the pool. Typically ARM references to AKS clusters or ACI Container Groups. For local and standard this must be a single reference. For portable there can be many.

PoolUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the Pool.
